casebody.data:
Margaret A. OAKLAND, petitioner,
v.
BELL STATE BANK & TRUST. No. 15-855. Supreme Court of the United States March 28, 2016. *1494Motion of Professor Jona Goldschmidt, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of North Dakota denied.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
